tweets.text:
London last 48 hours.

- Man on life support after being stabbed last night
- Woman stabbed to death Thursday night
- Man fighting for life after being shot by "machine gun"
- Another man critically injured after being stabbed

This will only get worse as the weather gets warmer.

Dear NRA,

I’m so proud! Today I went to the store, showed my ID, showed proof of residence, answered a few questions, had a small background check...

And now I am the owner of Children’s  Sudafed for my four year old daughter.

If only you pushed for those standards.
